vlive.korean: 오늘도 역시 변함없는 - 네! There was no change today either. - Yes! 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 투 머치 토커 아이유

vlive.korean: 변함 없네~ He doesn't change. 듣기 View video BTOB : 오랜만에 무대다!!!!

examples.korean: New secretaries came and went with monotonous regularity. 발음듣기 새 비서들이 변함없이 정기적으로 왔다가는 가 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: New secretaries came and went with monotonous regularity. 발음

examples.korean: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour. 발음듣기 모두가 그녀의 인내심과 변함없는 쾌활함에 감탄했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour. 발음

examples.korean: his invariable courtesy and charm 발음듣기 그의 변함없는 예의와 매력 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: his invariable courtesy and charm 발음

examples.korean: My opinion remains unchanged. 발음듣기 내 의견은 여전히 변함없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Her routine was invariable. 발음듣기 그녀의 틀에 박힌 생활은 변함이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
